page.title: 08SHOPPING IN MADELEY
page.content: There are lots of shops in Madeley.I like the paper shop because they sell sweets as well as newspapers and comics.I like sweets.My favourite sweet is bubble gum.You can blow bubbles with it while you eat it.I like chocolate as well. I like the sports shop.There they sell footballs and football boots and gloves.I can buy my games kit from there too. Sometimes I go to the supermarket with my mum.If she has a lot to buy she uses a trolley.When I was little I used to ride in the trolley while she pushed it round the shop.We usually go shopping on Saturday morning.We can get all our food in the supermarket.My mum buys enough meat for all the week.She keeps it in the freezer at home.We buy fresh vegetables for the weekend,and have frozen in the week.
